attr.title: ImageStriker2
attr.desc: ImageStriker2 is a vertical scroll Shoot 'em up made to pay homage to ImageFight, featuring 7 stages, Arcade Mode and 3 minutes score attack Caravan mode.
attr.inst: Download the game from Itch.io and copy the ImageStriker2.exe into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game from [Itch.io](https://terarin.itch.io/imagestriker2) and copy the `ImageStriker2.exe` into the `assets` folder.
